location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from William Bruce, Acting Resident at Bushire, currently at Bombay, to Lieutenant Robert Taylor, in Charge of the Residency at Bushire

mods.abstract: Letter requests samples of cotton from the different provinces of Persia. Also includes an enclosure: a letter, dated 26 May 1812, from James Farish, Acting Secretary to the Government, Bombay, to Bruce, Bombay, regarding payment owed to the Governor of Bushire for the pilotage of the Bussorapacket.
